knimeNode.name: Map Matcher
knimeNode.shortDescription: Match a route, described as a WKT-like Linestring, to the traversed street segments.

fullDescription.option: The setting informs the node about the type of coordinate pairs contained in the Linestring. Either {lon,lat} or {lon,lat}.
The path in which the .osm file containing the map data can be found.
The url at which the OSRM instance used for map-matching can be reached
By enabling this checkbox also the segments that were never visited will be added to the result table. If not, only the segments visited at least once will show up in the result.

ports.outPort: A table containing information about the traversed segments for each input route and, optionally, data about the segments that were never visited.
